sentences: Ma ütleksin, et see on hea mõte.
Ta ütleks, et tema sõber on haigeks jäänud.
Nad ütleksid, et see film on väga huvitav.
context: The word "ütleksid" is the conditional mood of the verb "ütlemine", which means to say or tell. It is commonly used in Estonian language to express what someone would say or think in a hypothetical situation.
